definitions.definition: The shape of a wave function represented by a graph showing some dependent variable as function of an independent variable .

The shape of a physical wave, such as sound, electric current or electromagnetic radiation, or its representation obtained by plotting a characteristic of the phenomenon (such as voltage ) versus another variable, often time.

main_definition: ( mathematics ) The shape of a wave function represented by a graph showing some dependent variable as function of an independent variable .
secondary_definitions: ( physics , engineering ) The shape of a physical wave, such as sound, electric current or electromagnetic radiation, or its representation obtained by plotting a characteristic of the phenomenon (such as voltage ) versus another variable, often time.
